publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-632# Mr Jamie Stone: North and West Scotland Care Alliance-That the Parliament recognises the vital role performed by North and West Sutherland Care Alliance through the provision of a home-based respite care service that brings much-needed relief and assistance to carers and those vulnerable individuals who would otherwise be unable to remain in their own homes and also recognises that equitable and adequate funding of the North and West Sutherland Care Alliance by both NHS Highland and Highland Council is essential.

S2M-632# Mr Jamie Stone: North and West Scotland Care Alliance-That the Parliament recognises the vital role performed by North and West Sutherland Care Alliance through the provision of a home-based respite care service that brings much-needed relief and assistance to carers and those vulnerable individuals who would otherwise be unable to remain in their own homes and also recognises that equitable and adequate funding of the North and West Sutherland Care Alliance by both NHS Highland and Highland Council is essential.
S2M-632# North and West Scotland Care Alliance (lodged on 19 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-632# North and West Scotland Care Alliance (lodged on 19 November 2003) John Farquhar Munro*
